description: Java class defining REST API endpoints for product search, retrieval, price history, and comparison, as part of a Spring Boot web application.

classes.name: ProductsController
classes.description: REST controller providing product-related endpoints such as search, get by ID, price history, and comparison.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Handles search requests for products by query, with pagination.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a product by its ID.

methods.name: history
methods.description: Returns recent price snapshots for a specified product.

methods.name: compare
methods.description: Provides placeholder comparison data for a product across retailers.
